[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@gnaudio/jabra-js](./jabra-js.md) &gt; [TrackingOptions](./jabra-js.trackingoptions.md)

## TrackingOptions enum

Used by [IConfig.tracking](./jabra-js.iconfig.tracking.md) to determine the level of allowed tracking of Jabra library usage and errors - defaults to NO\_TRACKING.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum TrackingOptions 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  NO\_TRACKING | <code>&quot;no-tracking&quot;</code> | No tracking will be enabled. |
|  TRACK\_ALL | <code>&quot;track-all&quot;</code> | All possible tracking is enabled. |
|  TRACK\_ERRORS | <code>&quot;track-errors&quot;</code> | Only errors that occur during library usage will be tracked. |
|  TRACK\_USAGE | <code>&quot;track-usage&quot;</code> | Only library usage will be tracked. |
